TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicResourceExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 實作標記延伸，這個標記延伸支援從 XAML 進行的動態資源參考。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that supports dynamic resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參考可能會在執行階段變更的內容時，會需要動態資源參考。Dynamic resource references are necessary when referencing content that might change at run-time. 內容變更的原因可能是應用程式啟動，或可能是外部。The reasons for the content change might be application-initiated or might be external. 例如，如果您同時納入報表使用者設定的喜好設定，例如佈景主題、 字型設定等的系統資源所依賴的樣式。One example is if you are including styles that rely on system resources that report user-configured preferences, such as themes, font settings and so on. 這個類別是標記延伸實作。This class is a markup extension implementation. 中的標記延伸類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]存在目的主要是為了提供某種程度的基礎結構支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作，並由標記延伸類別不通常稱為從公開的成員直接使用者程式碼。Markup extension classes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by the markup extension classes are not typically called from directly user code. 這個類別特別支援[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)使用方式從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This class particularly supports the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 如需動態資源參考的詳細資訊，請參閱[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。For more information about dynamic resource references, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md). ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object resourceKey) cil managed

param.name: resourceKey
param.span: 這個標記延伸參考的資源的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the resource that this markup extension references.

summary.span: 使用提供的初始索引鍵，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the provided initial key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器在處理的屬性語法[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。This constructor is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processors when processing the attribute syntax for the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可以為標記延伸提供服務的物件。

span.span: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.

summary.span: 傳回物件，這個物件應該設定於套用這個延伸的屬性上。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

summary.span: 對於 ，這是在目前父鏈結內的資源字典中找到的物件，目前父鏈結由 來索引。

span.span: For , this is the object found in a resource dictionary in the current parent chain that is keyed by the .

returns.span: 要在套用延伸的屬性上設定的物件。

span.span: The object to set on the property where the extension is applied.

returns.span: 這個物件將會是要在稍後評估的運算式，而不是實際值。

span.span: Rather than the actual value, this will be an expression that will be evaluated at a later time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作並不是直接呼叫。This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作會使用這個方法的適當處理[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)物件建立期間的值。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) values during object creation. 所提供的值要設定屬性必須是型別。The property to be set by the provided value must be of type . 此實作不需要傳遞任何服務`serviceProvider`。This implementation does not rely on any services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.

exception.span: 嘗試提供值給未指定 的延伸。

span.span: Attempted to provide a value for an extension that did not provide a .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ ResourceKey { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定由這個動態資源參考指定的索引鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the key specified by this dynamic resource reference.

summary.span: 這個索引鍵可用來使用中繼運算式查閱資源字典中的資源。

span.span: The key is used to lookup a resource in resource dictionaries, by means of an intermediate expression.

value.span: 這個動態資源參考所指定的資源索引鍵。

span.span: The resource key that this dynamic resource reference specifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 金鑰不強型別，但通常為任一字串中，提供，或衍生的類別。The key is not strongly typed, but is usually provided as either a string, a , or a derived class. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).
